title: What strings are on Takamine guitars? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to Takamine’s FAQ What brand/gauge strings are factory installed on Takamines? Six-string steel guitars: D’Addario EXP16 light-gauge stringsTwelve-string guitars: D’Addario EXP38 light-gauge stringsSix-string nylon guitars: D’Addario EXP45 Coated Normal Tension strings That said I have switched to Elixir strings of a similar gauge on my Tak. I just prefer they way they sound and the way they maintain their lustre. I guess the moral of the story is that strings are a personal preference and you should use what works for you.

Whatever strings you want to put on your Tak. If you look on their website, there will be a mention somewhere regarding strings. If it is an acoustic guitar, odds are it will be xxxxxxbrand 12 gauge. That’s pretty much the industry standard. One of the very very first things I do with a new guitar is take the factory strings off and put my favorite 11 gauge on. A lot of guys do this.
